Key Match Events: The Memphis Grizzlies went down 123-118 to the Golden State Warriors at Chase Center on Friday.
Pre-Game Insights: Scotty Pippen Jr. had rich praise from LeBron James earlier this season
Scotty Pippen Jr. and the Grizzlies head home for a three-game homestand with two games against the Denver Nuggets.
Post-Match Reflections: Pippen also collied with Stephen Curry to draw a charge in the final seconds of the second half.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotty Pippen Jr. had averaged 17.1 points (on 62.8% true shooting), 5.9 rebounds, 9.1 assists, 1.4 steals and 0.6 blocks in the season so far
Jaren Jackson Jr. was a bright spot for the Grizzlies with 32 points and six rebounds while Desmond Bane came off the bench for 18 points and six rebounds.
Others: Scotty Pippen Jr. ended the evening with three points, four rebounds and two assists.
